mapper.select: select category.cno, category.name, category.uno , wish.*, (select wish.fpath from wish where cno=1 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) as path1, (select wish.fpath from wish where cno=1 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) as path2, (select wish.fpath from wish where cno=1 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) as path3, (select wish.fpath from wish where cno=1 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) as path4 from category, wish where category.uno=#{uno} and wish.uno=#{uno} group by category.cno
